description: Oleotop is the first rapeseed (salmon feed) processing plant in southern Chile. It is part of the Inversiones Anka holding company.

Omie is a cloud based ERP for SMEs containing everything a manager needs to run a small business within the complex regulatory and tax environment of Brazil, including financials, invoicing, inventory, manufacturing, CRM, and POS.
Through it proprietary technology, Omniup helps businesses and locations monetize public WIFI connections.
Onapsis is a cyber security company, protecting organizations’ business applications from espionage, sabotage and fraud.

OneTray designs and produces fully customizable airport security trays based on both airport needs and brand advertising partnerships. The trays are recyclable, ultralight and RFID-enabled, and offer improved anti-bacterial qualities.
Online Pajak offers an online application that assists in the handling of corporate taxes and administration.
OnTruck is a leading on-demand logistics platform that connects businesses directly with road freight carriers, reinventing Europe’s trucking industry.
OnVacation is a vertically integrated travel and tourism company focused on the middle and low income domestic travel markets.
Opendat develops software that helps large mines in LatAm mitigate security risks and cut costs by efficiently managing the day-to-day activities of its employees.
OpenSooq is a classifieds platform in the Middle East & North Africa, where sellers can offer products and services to millions of users online without intermediaries.
OpenZeppelin provides security products to build, automate and operate apps and audits for decentralized systems.
OPI Analytics develops machine learning solutions for businesses.
Orfium is a music rights management and artist discovery platform offering technology solutions for rights-holders.

Osaka is a premium Nikkei (Peruvian-Japanese cuisine) restaurant chain, and Lima’s first to expand internationally. It was ranked #2 at the 2017 Summum Awards (Peru’s version of Michelin) and consistently tops the charts in each of the LatAm markets it operates in today.
OSeven Telematics provides pioneering smartphone telematics and driving behavior analytics for leading insurance and automotive companies around the globe.
OXXEAN provides maritime, port, and logistics services to commercial, sports, and tourism vessels in Chilean Patagonia.
Ozono Producciones has produced and promoted stage productions and live events for over a decade, showcasing Argentine talent both at home and in top locations worldwide.
Ozow is an instant EFT payment platform intended to make instant, secure, electronic payments straight into any bank account.

Pacari manufactures award-winning, premium, single-origin, organic chocolate made entirely in Ecuador. It has won “World’s Best Chocolate” at the International Chocolate Awards in London for eight consecutive years since 2012.
Panache International provides disposable containers that suit any client’s requirements and budget, from basic goods such paper cups to high-end products like heavy-duty packaging materials.
